mapper.insert: insert INTO board_ask (board_ask_number, board_ask_member_id, board_ask_date, board_ask_kind, board_ask_title, board_ask_content,board_ask_product_code, board_ask_order_number) VALUES (seq_board_ask.nextval,#{boardAskMemberId}, sysdate, #{boardAskKind} ,#{boardAskTitle}, #{boardAskContent}, #{boardAskProductCode}, #{boardAskOrderNumber} )

insert INTO board_review(board_review_number, board_review_member_id, board_review_product_code, board_review_score,board_review_content) VALUES (seq_board_review.nextval, #{boardReviewMemberId},#{boardReviewProductCode}, #{boardReviewScore}, #{boardReviewContent} )
